glsa.title: Libgcrypt: Side-channel attack
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Libgcrypt could allow a remote attacker to extract ElGamal private key information.

background.p: Libgcrypt is a general purpose cryptographic library derived out of GnuPG.

description.p: A vulnerability in the implementation of ElGamal decryption procedures of Libgcrypt leaks information to various side-channels.

impact.p: A physical side-channel attack allows a remote attacker to fully extract decryption keys during the decryption of a chosen ciphertext.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Libgcrypt users should upgrade to the latest version:
